description:
This Scyther belongs to the Gym Leader Danny of the Navel Island Gym.
Danny would use Nidoqueen to freeze water that was emitted from a geyser and then have Scyther along with Nidoqueen and Machoke to fashion it into a bobsled.
Scyther would also be apart of the team who rode the bobsled down the mountain using its scythes to steer and brake the sled. Scyther rode the bobled alongside Geodude and Electrode.
name: Strike (Dan)
